A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Totally amazing... While I can understand why it divided the fanbase so heavily and why some will come away not liking the film\, I myself found it to be absolutely incredible. It truly offers up a brand new layer to the Star Wars mythos and adds incredible depth and complexity to the very nature of what these movies have always been about. Overall\, I think I loved the film so much because I have always been familiar with and enjoyed the idea of a \"grey Jedi\"... I love seeing more dynamic and nuanced characters whose motivations are not always simply good or evil all the time\, or even at the most important times...
